channel.title: What do you think of our new website?
channel.description: We are trying out a new website to test whether people like it or not. What could be improved? https://www.carloop.io/

item.title: What do you think of our new website?
item.dc:creator: alanm
item.description:
re: case, I’m with you on that one => coming sooner than you think!

Would be great to get some feedback (and help ) on the docs. Where did you get stuck at the beginning? How can Getting Started with Carloop be better explained? The more contributors we can help get started, the higher number of CAN IDs we’ll have mapped to physical values. That’s the goal!

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think of our new website?

item.title: What do you think of our new website?
item.dc:creator: Izeroman
item.description:
Great starting point for the docs! As far as the store, would you consider adding some sort of nice plastic case for the Carloop? Right now I’m using some cheap Chinese ELM case to fit the whole thing. Looks pretty ugly

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think of our new website?

item.title: What do you think of our new website?
item.dc:creator: alanm
item.description:
@Izeroman, we’ve added some documentation on the website to get the ball rolling. We are using a platform called readme.io that allows anyone to edit documentation. See: carloop.io

Also, we’ve added a brand new store at store.carloop.io => a work in progress but really curious what you think of these new additions.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think of our new website?

item.title: What do you think of our new website?

item.source: What do you think of our new website?

item.title: What do you think of our new website?
item.dc:creator: Izeroman
item.description:
A lot better than the old one. My suggestion is to add ‘docs’ and ‘tutorials/examples’ as well as ‘project shares’ sections to your website.

Read full topic
